resources.string: Astromify
Question
Difficulty
Apollo astronauts collected Moon rocks for analysis. Astronauts haven\'t traveled to Mars to collect rocks, so we don\'t have any pieces of Mars to analyze.
Sunlight requires nearly 25 seconds to reach Earth.
The Moon is larger in surface area than the United States
Jupiter is more massive than all the other planets in our solar system put together
Approximately 90% of our galaxy might contain dark matter.
Of the four inner planets (Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars), Mars has the coolest surface temperature
Blue stars are much cooler than red stars.
Two spaceships leave earth in opposite directions, each traveling 0.9 times the speed of light. These two spaceships would never be able to communicate with each other.
The sun is one of the smallest stars in the galaxy.
One astronomical unit is equal to the diameter of the solar system.
We know Martian chemistry because of analysis that probes and lenders have conducted on the Mars material.
Sunlight requires 8.4 minutes to reach Earth.
The Moon\'s surface is almost equal to the combined surface area of North and South America
Jupiter\'s mass is greater than the combined mass of all the other planets in our solar system.

We believe that ninety percent of the galaxy might exist in a form we cannot "see." We determined its existence by analyzing stellar motions and realizing that stars wouldn\'t move as quickly as they do if the only matter in the galaxy was the visible matter.

Surprisingly, all the four inner worlds, the coolest surface is on Mercury. It rotates once every 60 Earth days and has hardly any atmosphere. So, when it turns away from the Sun, it radiates it heat into space and its surface temperature plunges to less than 200 degrees below zero!
The blue and blue/white stars are the truly hot ones. The red stars are cool, comparatively.

Even though, from Earth, these spaceships would appear to be moving away from each other at 1.8 times the speed of light, the relative speed between them would be less than the speed of light. Relativity is weird.
At least 85% of stars in the Milky Way are smaller than the sun. Large stars tend to have short life spans.
One astronomical unit is the distance from Earth to the Sun.
False
True
Correct!
Incorrect!

Result
Quit
